Add to a weapon's Relic Slot while crafting to deal Elemental Ice damage and use the Cryokinesis ability. Strong against Fire.

Cryokinesis - Use <keybind touch_img="Cryokinesis">Target</> to blast enemies with a cone of icy cold, dealing damage and Elemental Affliction.
